Quickstart

Basic Usage

Initialize BossKit:

from bosskit import BossKit

bk = BossKit()

Use a model:

response = bk.model("gpt-3.5-turbo").chat("Hello, how are you?")
print(f"Model response: {response}")

Caching:

Enable caching:

bk.enable_caching()

# Subsequent requests will be cached
response = bk.model("gpt-3.5-turbo").chat("Hello again!")
